# Acknowledgements {.unnumbered}

The development of the Kenya Statistical Quality Assurance Framework (KeSQAF) has been a collaborative effort involving numerous individuals, institutions, and organizations whose contributions have been invaluable in bringing this comprehensive framework to fruition.

We acknowledge the technical leadership provided by the Kenya National Bureau of Statistics (KNBS) management and the dedicated team of technical experts who spearheaded the development process:

**KNBS Senior Management Team**
- Director General, KNBS
- Deputy Director General
- Directors of Statistical Divisions
- Heads of Support Services Departments

**Technical Development Team**
- Methods and Standards Section
- Quality Working Group Members
- Statistical Production Division Staff
- Regional Statistical Officers
- Subject Matter Specialists

## Final Appreciation

The development of KeSQAF represents a collective effort of the entire statistical community in Kenya and beyond. While it is not possible to mention every individual who contributed to this effort, we deeply appreciate all contributions, however small or large, that have made this framework a reality.

We also acknowledge the users of official statistics – government agencies, private sector, civil society, academia, and the general public – whose need for high-quality, reliable statistical information provides the ultimate motivation for developing and implementing this quality assurance framework.

Finally, we recognize that the true measure of success for KeSQAF will be in its implementation and the continuous improvement of statistical quality across Kenya's statistical system. We look forward to the ongoing collaboration and commitment of all stakeholders in achieving this shared vision of statistical excellence.

**KNBS KeSQAF Development Team**  
Kenya National Bureau of Statistics  
2024
